response.overview: We know that Coach Tyranny is the most ferocious coach on the high school landscape, but this time, the real battles take place off the playing field. In the second episode of this animated series, unsuspected love interests force Tyranny into a tug-of-war over his heart and, ultimately, his soul. Meanwhile, a family get-together reminds Tyranny that his mother has never stopped teaching him eternal truths. Watch Coach Tyranny discover what it means to honor his mother and father, as well as learn other lessons God wants to teach all of us.
response.title: Coach Tyranny: Tough Love
